To change the usage model, follow these steps:

Sign in to the Azure portal as a global administrator.

Navigate to Azure Active Directory > Security > MFA.

Click on the settings link at the top of the page.

Under the usage model section, select the Per Enabled User option.

Click on the Save button to apply the changes.

Once the usage model has been updated, all users in Azure AD, including the new employees, will be required to use Multi-Factor Authentication. It is not necessary to create a new Multi-Factor Authentication provider, as the existing provider will continue to work with the updated usage model.
